verses.roman:
labdhvā guhaṁ te svaḥ-pālaṁ
mucukundam athābruvan
rājan viramatāṁ kṛcchrād
bhavān naḥ paripālanāt

synonyms: labdhvā—after obtaining; guham—Kārttikeya; te—they; svaḥ—of heaven; pālam—as the protector; mucukundam—to Mucukunda; atha—then; abruvan—said; rājan—O King; viramatām—please desist; kṛcchrāt—troublesome; bhavān—your good self; naḥ—our; paripālanāt—from the guarding.
translation: When the demigods obtained Kārttikeya as their general, they told Mucukunda, "O King, you may now give up your troublesome duty of guarding us.
